001package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.config;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.utilities.config.ConfigSource;
004import io.cyborgcode.utilities.config.PropertyConfig;
005import org.aeonbits.owner.Config;
006
007/**
008 * Configuration interface for API-related settings.
009 *
010 * <p>This interface utilizes the {@code Owner} library to load API configurations
011 * from system properties or a specified properties file. It supports customizable
012 * settings for logging, API base URLs, and more.
013 *
014 * <p>Configuration sources:
015 * <ul>
016 *     <li>System properties</li>
017 *     <li>Classpath properties file (defined via {@code api.config.file})</li>
018 * </ul>
019 *
020 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
021 */
022@ConfigSource("api-config")
023@Config.LoadPolicy(Config.LoadType.MERGE)
024@Config.Sources({"system:properties", "classpath:${api.config.file}.properties"})
025public interface ApiConfig extends PropertyConfig {
026
027   /**
028    * Retrieves the base package of the project for class scanning.
029    *
030    * @return The base package name defined in the configuration.
031    */
032   @Key("project.packages")
033   @Separator(";")
034   String[] projectPackages();
035
036   /**
037    * Determines whether RestAssured request/response logging is enabled.
038    *
039    * <p>Default: {@code true}
040    *
041    * @return {@code true} if logging is enabled, {@code false} otherwise.
042    */
043   @DefaultValue("true")
044   @Key("api.restassured.logging.enabled")
045   boolean restAssuredLoggingEnabled();
046
047   /**
048    * Specifies the logging level for RestAssured.
049    *
050    * <p>Default: {@code "ALL"}
051    *
052    * @return The logging level as a string (e.g., {@code "ALL"}, {@code "BASIC"}, {@code "NONE"}).
053    */
054   @DefaultValue("ALL")
055   @Key("api.restassured.logging.level")
056   String restAssuredLoggingLevel();
057
058   /**
059    * Retrieves the base URL for API requests.
060    *
061    * @return The API base URL.
062    */
063   @Key("api.base.url")
064   String baseUrl();
065
066   /**
067    * Determines whether the full response body should be logged.
068    *
069    * <p>If set to {@code true}, the entire response body will be logged. If {@code false},
070    * the response body will be truncated based on the {@code shorten.body} configuration.
071    *
072    * <p>Default: {@code true}
073    *
074    * @return {@code true} if full response body logging is enabled, {@code false} otherwise.
075    */
076   @DefaultValue("true")
077   @Key("log.full.body")
078   boolean logFullBody();
079
080   /**
081    * Specifies the maximum number of characters to display when logging a response body.
082    *
083    * <p>If {@code log.full.body} is set to {@code false}, response bodies longer than this value
084    * will be truncated with an ellipsis ({@code ...}).
085    *
086    * <p>Default: {@code 1000}
087    *
088    * @return The maximum number of characters to display in a logged response body.
089    */
090   @DefaultValue("1000")
091   @Key("shorten.body")
092   int shortenBody();
093
094}
